name: BeatNClean
description:
Continue to save the subway from the garbage and the society from the garbage-loving people who pollute the environment by walking along the deserted roads of the subway with your sister

You can take damage while attacking trash-loving people in your awesome moves. Don’t be afraid. You can keep fighting trash-loving people by collecting health bars along the way.

The weight of the trash and the trash-loving people attacking you will reduce its stamina.

Don’t forget! Reaching the highest score will bring you a cleaner society.

If you want the winners to be eco-friendly people, never give up!

Features:
Infinite Gameplay
Stylized Graphics
